title: Shutter
description: A simple shutter that can be regulated to dimm or block external light.

saref:hasFunction.saref:hasDescription: Move the shutter relatively to his current position. Negative values will close the shutter, positive will open. Eventual overflow will be rounded (min(offset, 100) or max(offset, 0)).
Open the shutter to the max level (100).
Close the shutter to the treshold.

is-open.title: Is open
is-open.description: Value is true if 'level' major than the openess treshold. Read-only: cannot write. Writing will cause refreshing this variable.

openess-treshold.title: Openess Treshold
openess-treshold.description: Value (in percentage) when to consider the shutter closed. 0 means always opened, 100 means always closed. A value of 20 means that shutter needs to roll 20% of his length to be considered open.

level.title: Level of aperture of shutter (in percentage)
level.description: Value (in percentage) of the current aperture of the shutter. 0 means it's all down (no light), 100 means it's all up (full light)

move.title: Move
move.description: Move the shutter relatively to his current position. Negative values will close the shutter, positive will open. Eventual overflow will be rounded (min(offset, 100) or max(offset, 0)).

open.title: Open
open.description: Set the level of the shutter to 100.

close.title: Close
close.description: Set the level of the shutter to <openess-treshold>.
